body_html: It says hybrid protocol is not supported, and I wonder if that is something we could work on. Traces in current TF here and there suggests that hybrid protocol is supported by the original TF in Google, yet these facilities are not used in your implementation.
body_text: It says hybrid protocol is not supported, and I wonder if that is something we could work on. Traces in current TF here and there suggests that hybrid protocol is supported by the original TF in Google, yet these facilities are not used in your implementation.
body: It says hybrid protocol is not supported, and I wonder if that is something we could work on. Traces in current TF [here](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/core/protobuf/worker.proto#L225) and [there](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/core/protobuf/worker.proto#L247) suggests that hybrid protocol is supported by the original TF in Google, yet these facilities are not used in your implementation.
